title: How to make my friend good - Quora

response.answer_text: The answer is that she is depressed, and not surprisingly so. Send her to a psychiatrist. There are medications out there that were not there 10-15 years ago. these will help.Right now she is on overload, and not handling anything real well, and worse, she is actually doing harm to those who try to help her.She can not help herself right now. She will probably be like this until she can get help.

You can't "make" anyone anything. All you can do is be there for her when she needs you, and be a good friend. Only she can decide what to do with her life and who to keep in it. Don't meddle in other people's relationships, as it only puts stress in yours.  Good luck.
